message:
The word """"Hindu"""" is an invented and foreign word, that is indeed only a few hundreds years old. You can study all the Vedas and never find the word Hindu mentioned even once. Therefore, when I made my statement above, it is not out of ignorance, and instead based on
[...Content omitted due to length constraints...]
the people living east of the Sindhu River. The statues of gods you are referring to are not actually Hindu, and existed long before Islam or any other foreign invader of India. Please do some research before making your comment. @Sandeep Ks: Prove which Veda the word Hindu comes from?
